Room.Name: Avatar Ruins Outer Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking around the northern side of the Avatar Ruins.
Room.LongDescription: Occassionally, you can see small animals flying about in the Ruins, but seldom do they seem to attack you. They appear to just be watching your progress from a distance. At times, they may come close enough to examine you, but it's hard to make out just what they are.
